price: 22. Hadday jiri lahaayeen dhexdooda (cirarka iyo dhulka) ilaahyo aan ahayn Alle, way fasaadi lahaayeen. Wuu ka hufan yahay Alle Rabbiga Carshiga Weyn leh oo ka Sarreeyaa waxay ku tilmaami.
arabic: لَوۡ كَانَ فِيهِمَآ ءَالِهَةٌ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ لَفَسَدَتَاۚ فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: law kāna fīhimā ālihatun illā al-lahu lafasadatā fasub'ḥāna al-lahi rabbi al-ʿarshi ʿammā yaṣifūna
